TopicTitle: The MX-15 Starjet (a simple cool looking jet fighter)

Articles.Content:
Just a simple fighter plane I built. Also incorporating an docking probe for anchoring to other structures/vehicle and mid air refueling.

Download: [http://www./download/tsq23cz0avoh929/Mx-15_Starjet.craft](http://www./download/tsq23cz0avoh929/Mx-15_Starjet.craft)

Action group:

1. Steering
